title: Who in BTS can compose the song by themselves? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of them compose to different extents but RM, suga and j-hope are the main ones. Taehyung and Jungkook have recently started to produce more. Jimin and Jin don’t really compose on their own but as their career progresses they are beginning too! All of their releases are edited & finalised by their in-company producers.

All of them compose their own songs but suga seems to be more successful at making hit makers. Every member is encouraged to write songs. Most of them have help from big hit songwriters by giving them a few lyrics and/or musical beats to work with.
